snippet: A new tray by Materious, the Chicago-based design studio, was inspired by the hillside terrain surrounding a Northern California vineyard.
abstract: Chicago-based design studio Materious introduces a limited-edition wood tray with removable pieces inspired by the hillside terrain around Northern California vineyards. Photos (S)
lead_paragraph: Designing a tray seems like it would be a relative no-brainer. But for Bruce and Stephanie Tharp of Materious, the Chicago-based design studio, it posed a challenge: ''how to bring something interesting to what is fundamentally just a flat surface,'' as Mr. Tharp put it. Still, when the Tharps were approached by Newton Vineyard about designing an accessory for the company's Eco-Chic collection, they settled on a tray and found inspiration in the hillside terrain surrounding the Northern California vineyard.
